keyMoments.title: Declaration of War on the World Government
keyMoments.description: The Straw Hat Pirates officially declare war on the World Government by burning their flag.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the crew's transition from regional pirates to major enemies of the World Government. This single act changes their status forever.

keyMoments.title: Robin Truly Joins the Crew
keyMoments.description: Robin finally accepts her place in the crew and declares she wants to live with them.
keyMoments.significance: Robin's emotional acceptance solidifies her as a true member of the Straw Hats after initially joining reluctantly.

reveals.information: The crew is willing to declare war on the entire world for a single member
